item.description: Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0531; 10:28AM; 1788 S La Cienega Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3bOhtdd; Mid-City; KNOCKDOWN: 37 firefighters extinguished the fire in 43 minutes with no injuries reported. While crews quickly knocked by the flames within the business, the attic and facade fire took longer to isolate and access all remaining pockets of fire. No injuries reported. The extent of fire and/or smoke damage through the structure is not known at this time. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 58; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC1 BC11 BC18 BC5 BC9 CM22 CM42 E261 E292 E294 E34 E43 E58 E68 EM14 RA58 RA858 T61 T92 T94; CH7; 15; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0531; 10:22AM; 1788 S La Cienega Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3bOhtdd; Mid-City; Firefighters are making good progress with an offensive operation and are chasing down the last of the fire in the building's fa√ßade. The fire appears to have originated in a pizzeria and extended into the attic. The structure is a small, one story (L-shaped) strip mall and the extent of possible fire damage to additional units is unknown at this time. Some LAFD resources are being released as crews are nearing extinguishment. ; FS 58; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC1 BC11 BC18 BC5 BC9 CM22 CM42 E261 E292 E294 E34 E43 E58 E68 EM14 RA58 RA858 T61 T92 T94; CH9; 15; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0531; 09:45AM; 1788 S La Cienega Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3bOhtdd; Mid-City; One story strip mall with heavy smoke showing. The initial report indicates an attic fire of a pizza restaurant. One additional task force requested.; FS 58; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC1 BC5 BC9 E261 E292 E43 E58 E68 RA58 RA858 T61 T92; CH9; 15; Margaret Stewart

Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0511; 09:51AM; 352 W Slauson Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3nywrH2; Florence; KNOCKDOWN: 48 firefighters extinguished the fire in 22 minutes with no injuries reported. After crews started making good progress, they transitioned to an offensive operation, moving inside for an interior fire attack (no roof operations). The building is divided into three units and the fire was primarily centered in one business (appears to be a wood-working operation). There are no injuries reported. Some LAFD resources are being released (knockdown achieved prior to the arrival of some of the added units). Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC18 BC2 CM22 E205 E221 E233 E266 E33 E46 E5 E57 E66 EM1 EM11 EM9 HR3 RA266 RA33 RA46 RA857 RA866 SQ21 T21 T33 T5 T66 UR5 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0511; 09:29AM; 352 W Slauson Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3nywrH2; Florence; One story, (metal clad) commercial building with fire showing through the roof. Firefighters are conducting forcible entry to gain access and conduct a defensive fire attack. There are no other structures exposed. No injuries reported. CHP are being notified for smoke impact on the Harbor Freeway (possible lane closures) refer to https://cad.chp.ca.gov/Traffic.aspx for closure updates. CHP Log# 991. Additional resources requested. The incident is titled Broadway IC.; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E233 E266 E33 E46 E66 RA266 RA46 RA857 RA866 SQ21 T33 T66; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1767; 11:59PM; 1158 E 50th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3R3JeyP; #CentralAlameda; It took 30 firefighters 19 minutes to extinguish the flames consuming a one-story residential structure to the rear of the property. No reports of occupants inside at the time. No reported injuries. The cause remains under investigation.; FS 21; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E14 E21 E215 E221 E233 RA21 RA833 SQ21 T15 T21 T33; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1767; 11:40PM; 1158 E 50th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3R3JeyP; #CentralAlameda; Fire showing from single family home to the rear of the property, with reports of wires down in the area. Front house remains uninvolved.; FS 21; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E14 E21 E215 E221 E233 RA21 RA833 SQ21 T15 T21 T33; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

title.a: CONTAINED #Avenue60Fire Greater Alarm Brush Fire 07/01/2022 INC#1649

item.description: CONTAINED #Avenue60Fire Greater Alarm Brush Fire; INC#1649; 11:08PM; 368 S Av 60; MAP: https://bit.ly/3R8JgWi; Highland Park; A total of 96 LAFD firefighters stopped forward progress at just under 5 acres in one hour and 17 minutes. Firefighters will remain on scene for an extended period of time to improve containment lines and ensure remaining hot spots and smoldering debris is fully extinguished. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation. ; FS 12; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; AO1 AO2 BC1 BC11 BC2 BC5 CM22 E1 E12 E16 E17 E2 E21 E212 E233 E235 E29 E290 E3 E42 E47 E55 E56 E66 E90 EA1 EM11 EM13 H1 H2 H4 H5 HA1 HA2 HA4 HA5 HT1 RA12 RA3 RA56 RA844 T12 T33 T35 T90 WT88; CH5; 13; Nicholas Prange

title.a: Update #Avenue60Fire Greater Alarm Brush Fire 07/01/2022 INC#1649

item.description: Update #Avenue60Fire Greater Alarm Brush Fire; INC#1649; 11:00PM; 368 S Av 60; MAP: https://bit.ly/3R8JgWi; #HighlandPark; Ninety-six LAFD firefighters (along with mutual aid from two LA County FD hand crews) continue to attack the fire by ground and air. The fire is burning uphill in steep terrain, but thankfully in very light wind conditions. Firefighter are assigned structure protection in a nearby neighborhood as a precaution. As air support continues to make water drops on the fire, ground crews are making their way around both flanks with hose lines and hand tools.; FS 12; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; AO1 AO2 BC1 BC11 BC2 BC5 CM22 E1 E12 E16 E17 E2 E21 E212 E233 E235 E29 E290 E3 E42 E47 E55 E56 E66 E90 EA1 EM11 EM13 H1 H2 H4 H5 HA1 HA2 HA4 HA5 HT1 RA12 RA3 RA56 RA844 T12 T33 T35 T90 WT88; CH5; 13; Nicholas Prange

Brush Fire; INC#1649; 09:51PM; 368 S Av 60; MAP: https://bit.ly/3R8JgWi; #HighlandPark; *Tentative Address* At least one acre of medium/heavy brush on fire. ; FS 12; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 E16 E21 E233 E235 E290 E42 E47 E55 E90 EM11 H1 H4 H5 HA1 HA4 HA5 RA12 T33 T35 T90; CH5; 13; Nicholas Prange
